verbs.description: [ARG0: A new report] [V: revealed] [ARGM-TMP: on Tuesday] [ARG1: that Donald Trump has yet to send his condolences to all the families of the victims of the Parkland Florida shooting earlier this year] .
A new report revealed on Tuesday that Donald Trump [V: has] yet to send his condolences to all the families of the victims of the Parkland Florida shooting earlier this year .
